item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Martin's Riverside

Martin's is a new restaurant located along the Quinnipiac River that has a huge outdoor patio with an amazing view of the river. Marty, the manager, has agreed to reserve half of the patio just for the NHC.

Specials for the NHC run till 9pm and include:
All Beers (bottles or drafts) - $3.00
Mixed Drinks - $4.00
House Wine - $5.00
Martini's - $6.00
Frozen Drinks - $7.00


Contact info: Jeanie 203-494-3518

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
